projects.title: Brain Tumor Detection Using Swin Transformer
projects.bodyText: A deep learning system that detects brain tumors from MRI scans using Swin Transformer architecture and Grad CAM for visual explanation. Designed to assist radiologists with reliable tumor localization.

projects.title: Blockchain-Based Voting System
projects.bodyText: A secure and transparent e voting platform using blockchain smart contracts to eliminate tampering and ensure integrity. Includes voter authentication, encrypted vote casting, and immutable ledger storage.

projects.title: Automatic Waste Segregation System
projects.bodyText: An automated system that classifies and segregates waste using embedded sensors and microcontrollers. Selected as an ACCS Finalist and designed for smart waste management in urban environments.

projects.title: AI-Driven Scholarship System (Hackathon)
projects.bodyText: Built during Hack Summit 2025 - an AI driven scholarship recommendation and auto form filling platform that matches students with suitable scholarships and assists in application completion.

projects.title: Women Safety Tracking System
projects.bodyText: A safety tracking system that sends real time location, emergency alerts, and continuous tracking to trusted contacts. Designed for rapid response during unsafe situations.
